SELECT comment_num, content, TO_CHAR(reg_date,'MM/DD HH24:MI') reg_date, post_num, id, anonymous, mem_num, post_mem_num, photoname FROM (SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM (SELECT c.comment_num, m.mem_num, p.mem_num post_mem_num, c.content, c.reg_date, c.post_num, m.id, c.anonymous, d.photoname FROM customboard_comment c JOIN member m ON c.mem_num=m.mem_num JOIN member_detail d ON m.mem_num=d.mem_num JOIN customPost p ON c.post_num=p.post_num WHERE c.post_num = #{post_num} ORDER BY comment_num DESC) a)
WHERE rnum >= 1 AND rnum <= 10
